info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued September 08 at 4:20PM EDT until September 08 at 11:00PM EDT by NWS Albany
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 445 PM EDT FOR NORTHEASTERN COLUMBIA AND SOUTHERN RENSSELAER COUNTIES... At 419 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Nassau, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Nassau, Stephentown, New Lebanon, Averill Park, West Sand Lake, Sand Lake, East Nassau, Totem Lodge, East Schodack, Brookview, Garfield, East Poestenkill, West Stephentown, Jacks Corners, Hoag Corners, Millers Corners, Rayville, Malden Bridge, Riders Mills and Taborton. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
